pullRequest.title: test(spring/cdi): add dmn juel context tests
pullRequest.bodyText: Test cases show that CDI & Spring beans can be resolved in the DMN Engine using JUEL.

nodes.bodyText:
What do you think about providing a more "production-grade" decision key here? 😃
Another minor thing that come to my mind with regards to what we learned over the last days:
The decision table methods are more of a left-over and deprecated (according to Philipp). Should we rather use the evaluateDecisionByKey method here instead? What do you think?
Same remark as above with regards to the evaluation method used and the decision key. 😃
